content.no:
"We Are One" er en låt hentet fra det norske rockebandet Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up" (utgitt: 19. November 2021)!
Kaasin har sluppet two singler "Runaway Train" og "Revelation" på Streampeak Music in 2020.
Kaasin gav ut sin tredje singel, "Hidden" på Pride & Joy Music i July 2021, som er den første singelen fra det kommende albumet "Fired Up".
Spilt inn hos Dehli Musikk, Bø i Telemark og Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produsert av Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & KAASIN
Mixet/mastret av Leif Johansen
Video av Jon Sandersen
Plateselskap: Pride & Joy Music
Musikere: Jan Thore Grefstad (vokal), Staale Kaasin (bass), Jo Henning Kaasin (gitar), Benjamin Dehli (tangenter), Chris Brush (trommer) og Per-Morten Bergseth (trommer i video)
content.en:
"We Are One" is a track taken from Norwegian Classic Rock act Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up" (released: November 19th, 2021)!
Kaasin released two singles "Runaway Train" and "Revelation" on Streampeak Music in 2020. 
Kaasin released a third single, "Hidden" on Pride & Joy Music in July 2021, i.e.the first single from the upcoming album, "Fired Up".
Recorded and engineered at Dehli Musikk, Bø in Telemark and Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produced by Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & KAASIN
Mixed/mastered by Leif Johansen
Video by Jon Sandersen
Label: Pride & Joy Music
Musicians: Jan Thore Grefstad (vocals), Staale Kaasin (bass), Jo Henning Kaasin (guitar), Benjamin Dehli (keyboards), Chris Brush (drums) and Per-Morten Bergseth (drums in video)
Kaasin - Melodic hardrock in the tradition of the great bands from the seventies and early eighties.

thumbnailDescription: Kaasin vocalist Jan Thore Grefstad singing

title.no: Sequential Circuits Pro-One gjennom en Korg MS-20
title.en: Running Sequential Circuits Pro-One through a Korg MS-20

content.no:
Kjører lyden fra en Sequential Circuits Pro-One gjennom en Korg MS-20 og styrer dens tonehøyde. Lyden fra synthene er uprosessert  bortsett fra litt klang fra en Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 som er lagt på.
Instrumenter: Sequential Circuits Pro-One og Korg MS-20.
Effekter: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
content.en:
Running a Sequential Circuits Pro-One through the Korg MS-20 and controlling its pitch with the audio.
The audio from the synthesizers is unprocessed except a small amount of reverb is added from the Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Instruments: Sequential Circuits Pro-One and Korg MS-20
Effects: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978

thumbnailDescription: A Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer and a Korg MS-20 synthesizer being played

name.en: Unison with 4 oscillators in 3 different octaves

content.no:
Et utdrag fra Warszawa av David Bowie og Brian Eno spilt på en Mellotron M4000D og en Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Instrumenter: Sequential Circuits Pro-One og Mellotron M4000D.
Effekter: VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr. og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris - CXM 1978.
Innspillingsutstyr: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
An excerpt from Warszawa by David Bowie and Brian Eno played on a Mellotron M4000D and a Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Instruments: Sequential Circuits Pro-One and Mellotron M4000D.
Effects: VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr. and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris - CXM 1978.
Recording equipment: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Mellotron M4000D with a  Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer on top being played
